originalText.text: Great experience.  Dr. Sippel and the fellows in training that support her are excellent.  Highly recommend.

text.text: Great experience.  Dr. Sippel and the fellows in training that support her are excellent.  Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Completely unreachable by phone. NYPConnect only allows new patients to schedule online, and calling into the clinic 5 times a day all results in the same elevator music or "your average wait time is 1 min".

text.text: Completely unreachable by phone. NYPConnect only allows new patients to schedule online, and calling into the clinic 5 times a day all results in the same elevator music or "your average wait time is 1 min".

originalText.text: Worst experience!!! Had appt. 7/5/22 @10:15 a.m. with Dr. Segal, but didn’t see her until 11:50 a.m. because the front desk staff is the most incompetent I’ve ever dealt with. They are rude, unprofessional, disorganized, and have no real procedures in place for checking in and out their patients. The woman I checked in with at the front desk kept disappearing behind the desk, and when she was there, she was too busy having a personal conversation with the co-worker next to her than making sure that she was doing her job right. As a result, she never really checked me in even though I gave her all my information! I ended up waiting extra long to see the doctor. They have no concern for their patients. Weill Cornell used to have a good reputation, but not anymore. They have really gone down the drain by having employees like this work for them. If I could give them zero stars - I would!! Administration, if you are reading this - YOU NEED TO DO BETTER!

originalText.text: This is the worst experience I have had I had a 915 doctors appointment. They told me when I went there. It would not take too much time at 9:40. I asked her when I will be taken. She told me it will be a few minutes. I finally left because I had to go to work and in order to make a new appointment I had to go around the corner on the floor and wait at someone’s desk to make another appointment more time. It was the most outrageous over booking waste of time I finally found an ophthalmologist in my neighborhood that is not part of a large corporation.

originalText.text: They have good doctor, but worse stuff.  The stuff are rude and very impatient.  I experienced the nurse who keep judge me many times based on the procedure that I have done.  The was that she talking to me is like a strict teacher are talking to the students.  I feel very uncomfortable, and she is not professional.  Other front desk people are careless, seems like they are looking down on people who are not white even they all have colors.  Waiting for almost one hour in the crowded environment where is no safe social distancing.  Very disappointed.
